card.name: Man of Tomorrow
card.text: To play, discard a Team Superman character card. Search your deck for a card named Superman, reveal it, and put it into your hand.

card.name: Super Speed
card.text: Remove a cosmic counter from target Team Superman character with cost 5 or less you control. If you do, ready that character and that character can't cause breakthrough this turn.

card.name: X-Ray Vision
card.text: Ongoing: Each opponent plays with the top card of his deck revealed while you control a Team Superman character. Exhaust two support row Team Superman characters you control -> Each opponent puts the top card of his deck into his KO'd pile.

card.name: Beautiful Dreamer, Forever People
card.text: Cosmic: Whenever Beautiful Dreamer becomes stunned, you may recover another target stunned character you control.

card.name: Big Barda, Barda Free
card.text: Cosmic: Pay half your endurance, rounded up -> Big Barda gets +4/+4 this attack. Use only once per turn.

card.name: Big Bear, Forever People
card.text: To recruit, reveal a New Gods character card from your hand. Cosmic: Big Bear gets +3/+3.

card.name: Fastbak, Sky Scorcher
card.text: Remove a cosmic counter from Fastbak -> Ready Fastbak. Use only once per turn. Cosmic: Fastbak gets +1 ATK.

card.name: Forager, Bug Warrior
card.text: Discard a New Gods character card -> Forager gets -1/+1 this attack. Boost 2: When Forager enters play, return a New Gods character card from your KO'd pile to your hand. Forager gets +X DEF this turn, where X is that card's cost.

card.name: Himon, Enigmatic Researcher
card.text: Your opponents can't play plot twists with cost 1 or less.

card.name: Infinity Man, Drax
card.text: Reveal Infinity Man, return two ready characters you control with the version Forever People to their owners' hands -> Cards named Infinity Man cost you 1 less to recruit this turn. Use only if Infinity Man is in your hand.

card.name: Izaya - Highfather, The Inheritor
card.text: At the start of the recovery phase, you may discard a New Gods character card. If you do, recover target stunned character you control.

card.name: Lightray, Solis
card.text: Activate -> Target player loses 7 endurance. Use only if you control another New Gods character.

card.name: Lonar, Explorer
card.text: Each opponent plays with the top card of his deck revealed. Pay 3 endurance -> Target opponent puts the top card of his deck on the bottom of his deck.

card.name: Mark Moonrider, Forever People
card.text: Cosmic: Activate -> Target player loses 5 endurance.

card.name: Metron, Time Traveler
card.text: Loyalty Cosmic: Remove a cosmic counter from Metron -> Negate target effect from a non-ongoing plot twist. Boost 2: When Metron enters play, your opponents can't play plot twists this turn.

card.name: Orion, Dog of War
card.text: Activate -> Remove target attacker from this attack. Cosmic: Pay 3 endurance, discard a New Gods character card -> Negate target effect from a non-ongoing plot twist.

card.name: Orion, True Son of Darkseid
card.text: Cosmic: Remove a cosmic counter from Orion -> Remove a cosmic counter from any number of target characters your opponents control. Use only if you control another New Gods character.

card.name: Scott Free - Mister Miracle, Escape Artist
card.text: Loyalty, Evasion Cosmic: Activate, remove a cosmic counter from Scott Free -> Remove target attacker from this attack. Use only if Scott Free is defending.

card.name: Serifan, Forever People
card.text: Cosmic: New Gods characters you control have invulnerability.

card.name: Takion - Highfather, Josh Saunders
card.text: Activate, discard a New Gods character card -> Each player puts the top card of his deck into his resource row. Use only during the recovery phase.

card.name: Vykin, Forever People
card.text: Pay 1 endurance -> Other characters with cost 2 or less can't ready this turn. Use only during the recovery phase.

card.name: Astro Force
card.text: To play, discard a New Gods character card. Target New Gods attacker you control can't cause breakthrough this attack. That attacker gets +X/+x this attack, where X is that attacker's cost.

card.name: Dog of War
card.text: New Gods characters you control get +1/+1 while an opponent controls more non-stunned characters than you this turn.

card.name: Escape Artist
card.text: Return target ready New Gods defender you control to its owner's hand. Remove all attackers from this attack. (The attackers don't ready.)

card.name: Forever People
card.text: To play, exhaust a New Gods character you control. Put target character card with the version Forever People from your KO'd pile into your support row, stunned.

card.name: New Genesis
card.text: Activate, discard two cards -> Recover target stunned New Gods character you control. If that character has cosmic, put a cosmic counter on it. Use only once per turn.

card.name: Supercycle
card.text: Equipped character has invulnerability while it has a cosmic counter. New Gods characters you control get +1/+1 and have flight.

card.name: The Prophecy Fulfilled
card.text: Play only during the build phase. Ongoing: At the start of the recovery phase, if you control a non-stunned New Gods character, each opponent with 0 or less endurance loses the game.

card.name: The Source
card.text: Replace The Source -> Replace target plot twist an opponent controls. Search that opponent's deck, hand, and KO'd pile for all cards with the same name as that plot twist and remove them from the game. Use only if you control a New Gods character.

card.name: Atomic Skull, Joe Martin
card.text: Reveal a Revenge Squad character card from your hand -> Stun target character if its cost is less than the number of ongoing plot twists you control. Use only during your attack step and only once per turn.

card.name: Bizarro, Imperfect Duplicate
card.text: Discard a Revenge Squad character card -> Switch Bizarro's ATK and DEF this attack.

card.name: Brainiac 2.5, Vrill Dox
card.text: Non-Revenge Squad characters get -1 DEF while Brainiac 2.5 is ready and -1 ATK while Brainiac 2.5 is exhausted. Boost 2: When Brainiac 2.5 enters play, non-Revenge Squad characters get -2/-2 this turn.

card.name: Dominus, Tuoni
card.text: When Dominus enters play, choose a character name. Cosmic: Characters with the chosen name can't ready.

card.name: Doomsday, Armageddon Creature
card.text: Loyalty Doomsday can't cause breakthrough. Whenever Doomsday stuns a character an opponent controls, ready Doomsday.

card.name: Encantadora, Lourdes Lucero
card.text: At the start of the recovery phase, you may remove a counter from target character.

card.name: Eradicator, Doctor David Connor
card.text: Whenever Eradicator stuns a defender, replace any number of target locations controlled by that defender's controller.

card.name: General Zod, Ruler of Pokolistan
card.text: KO a Revenge Squad character you control -> Exhaust target character if its cost is less than or equal to the cost of the character you KO'd.

card.name: Gog, Nemesis
card.text: Gog gets +2 ATK while attacking a Team Superman character. Cosmic: While you control another Revenge Squad character, whenever Gog attacks a defender, that defender's controller loses endurance equal to that defender's cost.

card.name: Hank Henshaw - Cyborg, Evil Impostor
card.text: When Hank Henshaw enters play, choose a character an opponent controls. Hank Henshaw can't be stunned while in combat with the chosen character.

card.name: Hope, Amazon Bodyguard
card.text: KO Hope -> Turn target face-up ongoing plot twist you control face down.

card.name: Intergang, Army
card.text: Exhaust a location you control -> Characters named Intergang get +1/+1 this attack.

card.name: Lex Luthor, Power Armor
card.text: Loyalty Whenever Lex Luthor causes breakthrough to a player, that player can't recruit characters with cost 7 or greater next turn.

card.name: Lex Luthor, President Luthor
card.text: You can't draw cards during the draw phase. At the start of the draw phase, put the top X cards of your deck into your hand, where X is the number of ongoing plot twists you control. Put a card from your hand on the bottom of your deck.

card.name: Massacre, Alien Bounty Hunter
card.text: To recruit, reveal a Revenge Squad character card from your hand. Whenever Massacre becomes stunned, KO all stunned characters.

card.name: Mercy, Amazon Bodyguard
card.text: KO Mercy -> Target Revenge Squad defender you control can't be stunned this attack.

card.name: Metallo, John Corben
card.text: Whenever Metallo attacks a character, remove a cosmic counter from that character and KO all equipment equipped to that character. Whenever Metallo defends, remove a cosmic counter from each attacker and KO all equipment equipped to each attacker.

card.name: Mongal, Ruler of Almerac
card.text: Whenever Mongal attacks a character, you may move that character to its controller's support row.

card.name: Mongul, Tyrant of Warworld
card.text: Cosmic: While you control another Revenge Squad character, whenever Mongul stuns a character, that character's controller loses endurance equal to its cost. Boost 2: When Mongul enters play, you may stun target character with cost 4 or less.

card.name: Mr. Mxyzptlk, Fifth Dimension Imp
card.text: Mr. Mxyzptlk costs you 1 less to recruit for each Revenge Squad character you control. Mr. Mxyzptlk can't be stunned. Whenever Mr. Mxyzptlk defends, return him to his owner's hand.

card.name: Parasite, Rudy Jones
card.text: Parasite does not come into play with a cosmic counter. Whenever Parasite stuns a character, put a cosmic counter on Parasite. Cosmic: Parasite gets +4/+4.

card.name: Prankster, Oswald Loomis
card.text: Activate, choose a number -> Target opponent reveals the top four cards of his deck. That player puts all revealed cards with cost equal to the chosen number into his KO'd pile and the rest on the top of his deck in any order.

card.name: Satanus, Evil Incarnate
card.text: Whenever Satanus stuns a defender, recover that defender and move it to your support row. That character gains the Revenge Squad affiliation. (You control that character.)

card.name: Silver Banshee, Siobhan McDougal
card.text: Cosmic: Activate -> KO target stunned character.

card.name: Talia, LexCorp CEO
card.text: Exhaust a location you control -> Draw a card, then put a card from your hand on the bottom of your deck. Use only if you control another Revenge Squad character.

card.name: Winslow Schott - Toyman, Crooked Craftsman
card.text: Whenever Winslow Schott attacks, you may reveal a face-down resource you control. If you revealed a Revenge Squad character card, replace that card and Winslow Schott gets +1 ATK this attack. Whenever Winslow Schott defends, for each attacker, you may reveal a face-down resource you control. For each Revenge Squad character card you revealed, Winslow Schott gets +1 ATK this attack and replace that card.

card.name: Bizarro World
card.text: Bizarro World is considered to be in all sets. Flip only if you control a Revenge Squad character. [Activate] -> Reveal the top card of your deck and put it into your hand. If it has the word Bizarro in its name or game text, continue this process until you put a card into your hand without the word Bizarro in its name or game text. (See bizarroworld.com.)

card.name: Brainiac's Ship, Unique
card.text: Transferable Equip only to a Revenge Squad character you control. Characters your opponents control get -1/-1.

card.name: Feeding Time!
card.text: Whenever target Revenge Squad character you control stuns a defender that does not have reinforcement this turn, gain X endurance, where X is that defender's cost.

card.name: Kryptonite
card.text: Play only if you control a Revenge Squad character. Target character gets -2 DEF and loses invulnerability this turn. If that character has a cosmic counter, remove it.

card.name: LexCorp
card.text: Activate -> Replace a face-down resource you control. Replace LexCorp -> Replace target plot twist you control. Use only if you control a Revenge Squad character.

card.name: Revenge Pact
card.text: Ongoing: Pay 3 endurance, discard a card -> Reveal the top five cards of your deck. Put a revealed Revenge Squad character card into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck. Use only once per turn.

card.name: State of the Union
card.text: Ongoing: Resources you control can't be the target of plot twist effects your opponents control while you control a non-stunned Revenge Squad character.

card.name: Suicide Slums
card.text: Activate -> Target Revenge Squad character you control gets +2 ATK this attack. Whenever that character becomes stunned this attack, KO it.

card.name: Toy Soldiers
card.text: Ongoing: Revenge Squad attackers you control get +1/+1 while you control more characters than each other player.

card.name: Warworld
card.text: Flip only if you control a Revenge Squad character. If an attacker would cause breakthrough while attacking a defender, instead, that defender's controller loses endurance equal to that attacker's cost.

card.name: Amazing Grace, Manipulator
card.text: Activate, discard a Darkseid's Elite character card -> Target player chooses a character with cost 3 or less he controls. Move that character to your front row. That character gains the Darkseid's Elite affiliation. Use only during the recovery phase. (You control that character.)

card.name: Bernadeth, Leader of Female Furies
card.text: Pay 1 endurance -> Whenever a character an opponent controls recovers this phase, its controller loses endurance equal to its cost. Use only once per turn.

card.name: Brimstone, Engine of Destruction
card.text: Loyalty Pay 1 resource point -> At the start of the combat phase this turn, KO target resource. Use only once per turn.

card.name: Darkseid, Lord of Apokolips
card.text: To recruit, discard a Darkseid's Elite character card. At the start of the recovery phase, KO all other characters.

card.name: Darkseid, Uxas
card.text: To recruit, reveal a Darkseid's Elite character card from your hand. Remove a cosmic counter from Darkseid -> KO all stunned characters. Cosmic: Characters can't be KO'd during the recovery phase.

card.name: Desaad, Royal Torturer
card.text: Activate -> The controller of target stunned character loses endurance equal to its cost.

card.name: Devilance, The Pursuer
card.text: Whenever Devilance stuns a character, that character's controller loses endurance equal to the number of face-down resources he controls. Boost 2: When Devilance enters play, he gets +6/+6 this turn.

card.name: Glorious Godfrey, Persuader
card.text: Activate -> Exhaust target character with cost 4 or less. That character's controller loses endurance equal to its cost. Use only if you control another Darkseid's Elite character.

card.name: Gole, Deep Six
card.text: Whenever Gole becomes stunned, each opponent loses 1 endurance for each face-down resource he controls.

card.name: Granny Goodness, Everyone's Favorite Granny
card.text: Affiliated characters you control with cost 3 or less lose their affiliations and have the Darkseid's Elite affiliation. Other non-Army Darkseid's Elite characters you control with cost 3 or less get +1 ATK.

card.name: Hunger Dogs, Army
card.text: Whenever Hunger Dogs attacks, each player loses 1 endurance. Whenever Hunger Dogs defends, each player loses 1 endurance for each attacker.

card.name: Jaffar, Deep Six
card.text: Exhaust two characters you control with the version Deep Six -> Gain 1 resource point. Spend this point only to recruit a character card with the version Deep Six. Use only during your recruit step.

card.name: Kalibak, Unworthy Son
card.text: Kalibak gets -1/-1 for each non-Darkseid's Elite character you control. Whenever Kalibak becomes stunned, you lose 7 endurance.

card.name: Kanto, Darkseid's Assassin
card.text: Pay 3 endurance -> KO target character if its cost is less than or equal to the number of face-down resources its controller controls. Use only once per turn and only during your attack step.

card.name: Kurin, Deep Six
card.text: Activate -> Target attacker with the version Deep Six gets +1 ATK this attack for each face-down resource you control.

card.name: Shaligo, Deep Six
card.text: Pay 1 endurance -> Turn target face-up resource an opponent controls face down.

card.name: Slig, Deep Six
card.text: Cosmic: Activate -> KO target stunned character if its cost is less than the number of face-down resources you control.

card.name: Steppenwolf, Darkseid's General
card.text: Cosmic: Pay 3 endurance -> Characters your opponents control lose reinforcement this turn. Use only if you control another Darkseid's Elite character. Boost 1: When Steppenwolf enters play, Darkseid's Elite characters get +2 ATK while attacking this turn.

card.name: Superman, False Son
card.text: Whenever a front row defender an opponent controls becomes stunned, KO it.

card.name: Topkick, Parademon Drill Instructor
card.text: Whenever another Darkseid's Elite character enters play, each opponent loses 1 endurance. Boost 1: When Topkick enters play, return up to three Army Darkseid's Elite character cards from your KO'd pile to your hand.

card.name: Trok, Deep Six
card.text: Trok gets +1 ATK for each face-down resource your opponents control.

card.name: Anti-Life Equation
card.text: Play only if you control a Darkseid's Elite character. Ongoing: At the start of the recovery phase, starting with you, each player chooses a different number. The player who chose the highest number loses that much endurance. Each other player gains that much endurance and stuns a non-stunned character he controls.

card.name: Apokolips
card.text: Activate -> Choose a player. Target Darkseid's Elite attacker you control gets +1 ATK this attack for each face-down resource the chosen player controls.

card.name: Armagetto
card.text: Activate, KO a Darkseid's Elite character you control -> Target attacker you control gets +X/+x this attack, where X is the cost of the character you KO'd.

card.name: Beta Club
card.text: Equip only to a Darkseid's Elite character. Whenever equipped character stuns a defender, that defender's controller loses endurance equal to its cost.

card.name: Firepits of Apokolips
card.text: At the start of your recruit step, lose 2 endurance. Exhaust a Darkseid's Elite character you control -> Exchange the positions of Firepits of Apokolips and target face-down resource an opponent controls. Use only during the recovery phase.

card.name: Granny Loves You
card.text: Ongoing: At the start of the recovery phase, if you control a Darkseid's Elite character, each player loses 1 endurance for each stunned character he controls.

card.name: Happiness Home
card.text: To flip, KO a non-stunned character you control. Non-Army Darkseid's Elite attackers you control with cost 3 or less get +2/+2. Darkseid's Elite characters you control with cost 3 or less can't recover.

card.name: Hordes of Apokolips
card.text: Up to three target Darkseid's Elite characters you control each get +2 ATK while attacking this turn.

card.name: Omega Beams
card.text: To play, exhaust a Darkseid's Elite character you control. Remove all stunned characters from the game.

card.name: Ride of the Black Racer
card.text: To play, discard two Darkseid's Elite character cards. Choose one: KO target stunned character; or recover target stunned character you control.

card.name: Blood Feud
card.text: Target Darkseid's Elite or New Gods character you control gets +3/-3 this attack.

card.name: Phantom Zone
card.text: Flip only if you control a Revenge Squad or Team Superman character. Activate -> Remove target card in a KO'd pile from the game. Replace Phantom Zone -> Remove target card in a KO'd pile from the game.

card.name: The Exchange
card.text: Discard any number of character cards. Search your deck for a Darkseid's Elite or New Gods character card with cost less than or equal to the combined cost of the cards you discarded, reveal it, and put it into your hand.

card.name: Barbara Gordon - Batgirl, Guardian of Gotham
card.text: Whenever an equipped Gotham Knights character you control stuns a character an opponent controls, draw a card.

card.name: Jason Todd - Robin, Crime Fighter
card.text: Stun Jason Todd -> Exhaust target Gotham Knights defender you control and remove all attackers from this attack. Use only if Jason Todd is not defending.

card.name: Spoiler - Robin, The Girl Wonder
card.text: Evasion Activate -> Target Gotham Knights defender gets +X ATK this attack, where X is that character's cost.

card.name: Detective Work
card.text: Play only if you control a Gotham Knights character. Negate target effect from a non-ongoing plot twist with cost 1 or less. If Detective Work is in your resource row, draw a card.

card.name: Donna Troy - Troia, Child of Myth
card.text: Loyalty Whenever Donna Troy becomes stunned, return her to her owner's hand. Boost 1: When Donna Troy enters play, she has invulnerability this turn.

card.name: Roy Harper - Speedy, Mercurial Marksman
card.text: Put Roy Harper on the top of owner's deck -> KO target character with cost 1 or less. Exhaust a Teen Titans character you control -> Roy Harper gets +1 ATK this turn.

card.name: Wally West - Kid Flash, Fastest Teen Alive
card.text: Pay 1 endurance -> Ready Wally West. He can't cause breakthrough this turn. Use only once per turn and only if Wally West was powered-up this turn.

card.name: New Teen Titans
card.text: Power-up all Teen Titans attackers you control.

card.name: Blockbuster, Roland Desmond
card.text: Cosmic: Blockbuster gets +3 ATK.

card.name: Maxie Zeus, God Complex
card.text: Cosmic: Whenever an Arkham Inmates character you control causes breakthrough to a player, that player discards a card.

card.name: The Joker, Emperor Joker
card.text: Loyalty When The Joker enters play or recovers, each opponent with no cards left in his deck loses the game. Whenever a card leaves an opponent's deck, if that player has no cards left in his deck, he loses the game. Pay 1 endurance -> If an opponent would lose endurance this turn, instead, that opponent removes from the game that number of cards from the top of his deck.

card.name: Smiles, Everyone!
card.text: Play only if you control an Arkham Inmates character. Whenever target exhausted defender becomes stunned this turn, KO it.

card.name: Bronze Tiger, Benjamin Turner
card.text: Bronze Tiger gets +2/+2 for each stunned League of Assassins character you control.

card.name: Merlyn, Deadly Archer
card.text: Cosmic: Activate -> KO target character if its cost is less than the number of locations you control. Use only during your attack step.

card.name: Pit of Madness
card.text: Activate -> Choose one: Target League of Assassins defender you control gets +2 ATK this attack for each stunned character you control; or target League of Assassins defender you control gets +2 DEF this attack for each stunned character you control.

card.name: The Demon's Head
card.text: To play, exhaust a League of Assassins character you control. If The Demon's Head is in your resource row, KO it. If you do, search your deck for a location card, reveal it, and put it face down into your resource row.

card.name: Charger, Power Conduit
card.text: Remove a cosmic counter from Charger -> Charger gets +3/+3 this turn. Use only once per turn. Cosmic: Charger gets +1/+1.

card.name: Deuce, Miss Perception
card.text: Deuce gets +2/+2 while in combat with a character with cost 2.

card.name: Imperiex, The Beginning and The End
card.text: Imperiex costs you 1 less to recruit if you control no characters. At the start of your attack step, KO all other characters.

card.name: Back to Back
card.text: Two target characters you control each get +1/+1 while defending in the same column this turn.

card.name: Boom Tube
card.text: Choose one: Target support row defender you control has reinforcement this attack; or return target front row defender you control to its owner's hand. (When an attack concludes, if there is no defender, ready all attackers.)

card.name: Female Furies
card.text: To play, KO a character you control. Target attacker or defender you control gets +3 ATK this attack.

card.name: Heat Vision
card.text: Exhaust target defender you control. If you do, that defender gets +3 ATK this attack and whenever that defender stuns an attacker this attack, that attacker's controller loses 3 endurance.

card.name: I Hate Magic!
card.text: Target defender gets -3 DEF and loses invulnerability this attack.

card.name: Men of Steel
card.text: Target support row defender you control gets +1 DEF this attack for each other non-stunned character you control.

card.name: Metropolis, Non-Unique
card.text: When you flip Metropolis, choose two affiliations among characters you control. Characters you control, as well as cards in your deck, hand, and KO'd pile, with either of those affiliations have both of them.

card.name: Mother Box
card.text: Remove a cosmic counter from a character you control -> Gain 3 endurance. Pay 3 endurance -> Put a cosmic counter on target cosmic character you control. Use only once per turn.

card.name: Narrow Escape
card.text: Exhaust target defender you control. If you do, it gets +2 DEF this attack.

card.name: Path of Destruction
card.text: Target attacker you control gets +2 ATK this attack and an additional +2 ATK this attack for each other card named Path of Destruction in your KO'd pile.

card.name: Phantom Zone Projector
card.text: Equipped character has Activate -> Remove target stunned character from the game. Use only during the recovery phase.

card.name: Play Time
card.text: Target opponent moves target character he controls to a different position.

card.name: Royal Decree
card.text: Choose two affiliations among characters you control. If you chose New Gods and another affiliation, draw a card. Ongoing: Characters you control, as well as cards in your deck, hand, and KO'd pile, with either of those affiliations have both of them.

card.name: Stopped Cold
card.text: Target character gets -1/-1 while attacking this turn and loses flight this turn.

card.name: Super Strength
card.text: Target attacker you control gets +2 ATK this attack. You may remove a cosmic counter from that attacker. If you do, it gets +2 DEF this attack.

card.name: Up, Up, and Away
card.text: Target character gets +1/+1 while attacking this turn and has flight this turn.

card.name: Bibbo Bibbowski, Barroom Brawler
card.text: Activate -> Target Team Superman character protecting Bibbo Bibbowski gets +2 DEF this attack.

card.name: Brahma, Supermen of America
card.text: Cosmic: Characters in your support row can't be attacked while Brahma is visible in your front row.

card.name: The Guardian, Jim Harper
card.text: A character protected by The Guardian gets +1/+1 and has range.

card.name: Hiro Okamura - Toyman, Whiz-Kid
card.text: Activate -> If Hiro Okamura is protected, draw a card. Use only during the combat phase.

card.name: John Henry Irons - Steel, Armor Aura
card.text: Reservist Other Team Superman characters you control get +2 DEF.

card.name: John Henry Irons - Steel, Steel Works
card.text: Ally: Whenever a character you control becomes powered-up during your first attack and defense each turn, it gets an additional +1/+1 this attack.

card.name: Kara Zor-El - Flamebird, Kandorian Vigilante
card.text: Team Superman characters you control get +2 ATK during your first attack and defense each turn.

card.name: Kara Zor-El - Supergirl, Claire Connors
card.text: Cosmic: Whenever Kara Zor-El team attacks or becomes team attacked, you may stun target character that is not in combat.

card.name: Kelex, Caretaker of the Fortress
card.text: Free -> Recover target stunned Team Superman character you control. Use only during the recovery phase and only once per turn.

card.name: Krypto, Guard Dog of El
card.text: Krypto can't attack unless he is protecting a character.

card.name: Lois Lane, Reporter Extraordinaire
card.text: Lois Lane costs 1 less to recruit while you control Superman.

card.name: Loser, Supermen of America
card.text: Activate -> Target character with cost 2 or less can't attack this turn.

card.name: Maximum, Supermen of America
card.text: Cosmic: Characters in Maximum's column get +2 DEF.

card.name: Natasha Irons - Steel, Unlikely Alloy
card.text: Invulnerability

card.name: The Newsboy Legion, Army
card.text: A character protecting The Newsboy Legion gets +1/+1.

card.name: Outburst, Supermen of America
card.text: Activate -> Target character loses and can't have flight this turn.

card.name: Power Girl - Nightwing, Kandorian Vigilante
card.text: Team Superman characters you control get +2 DEF during your first attack and defense each turn.

card.name: Pyrogen, Supermen of America
card.text: Loyalty - Reveal Activate -> Stun Pyrogen. If you do, stun target attacker.

card.name: Superman, Man of Tomorrow
card.text: Superman has invulnerability during your first attack and defense each turn.

card.name: Superman, Deterrent Force
card.text: Loyalty Cosmic: Activate -> Target character can't attack this turn.

card.name: Superman, Last Son of Krypton
card.text: Loyalty - Reveal To recruit, pay 4 resource points. (Superman's cost is not odd; even; or greater than, less than, or equal to any value. You don't lose endurance as he becomes stunned.)

card.name: Superman, Bulletproof
card.text: Superman can't be stunned.

card.name: Vartox, Hero of Tynola
card.text: Cosmic: Free -> Remove target defender you control from this attack, and Vartox becomes a defender. Use only once per turn.

card.name: White Lotus, Supermen of America
card.text: At the start of the combat phase, you may move White Lotus to your hidden or visible area.

card.name: Wonder Woman, Deflection Diva
card.text: Cosmic: Whenever Wonder Woman defends, you may exhaust her. If you do, remove all defenders from this attack and another target Team Superman character you control becomes a defender.

card.name: City of Tomorrow, Team-Up

card.name: Kandor, City in a Bottle

card.name: Smallville
card.text: Protected Team Superman characters you control get +1/+1 and have range.

card.name: Desperate Sacrifice
card.text: Exhaust a protected Team Superman defender you control. If you do, remove that defender from this attack, and the character protecting it becomes a defender.

card.name: Double Team
card.text: Two target Team Superman characters you control each get +1/+1 while in the same column this turn.

card.name: Early Edition
card.text: To play, discard a Team Superman character card. Negate target effect from a non-ongoing plot twist that doesn't share a name with another card in its controller's resource row or KO'd pile.

card.name: For the Man Who Has Everything
card.text: Search your deck for a Team Superman character card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If it doesn't share a name with a character you control, discard a card.

card.name: Future Friends
card.text: Target Team Superman attacker or defender you control gets +1 DEF this attack and an additional +1 DEF for each other Future Friends in your resource row and KO'd pile.

card.name: Good Boy!
card.text: Choose a number. If you control a Team Superman character, gain 1 endurance and an additional 1 endurance for each face-up resource you control with cost equal to that number.

card.name: Home Sweet Home
card.text: To play, exhaust a Team Superman character you control. Recover target stunned character you control at the start of the recovery phase this turn.

card.name: Impervious
card.text: Play only during your first attack or defense each turn. Target Team Superman character you control gets +3 DEF this attack.

card.name: Iron Will
card.text: Target Team Superman attacker you control gets +1/+1 this attack and an additional +1/+1 for each other Iron Will in your resource row and KO'd pile.

card.name: Soaring to New Heights
card.text: Target Team Superman attacker you control gets +3 ATK this attack and also gets +3 DEF if you control Superman.

card.name: Alfred Pennyworth, Faithful Friend
card.text: Alfred Pennyworth enters play exhausted. Activate, return Alfred Pennyworth to his owner's hand -> Search your deck for a plot twist or equipment card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Use only if you control another Gotham Knights character.

card.name: Golden Archer, Wyatt McDonald
card.text: Reservist (You may recruit this card from your resource row. If you do, you may put a card from your hand face down into your resource row.) Activate -> Target opponent loses 6 endurance. Then that opponent gains 1 endurance for each card in your hand.

card.name: Haywire, Harold Danforth
card.text: Reservist (You may recruit this card from your resource row. If you do, you may put a card from your hand face down into your resource row.) If Haywire would cause breakthrough while attacking a character, instead, that character can't ready this turn.

card.name: Hyperion, Mark Milton
card.text: Leader: Characters adjacent to Hyperion gain the Squadron Supreme affiliation. Characters adjacent to Hyperion can't be stunned while attacking a character with reinforcement.

card.name: Hyperion, Sun God
card.text: Recruit only if you have no other cards in hand. Hyperion can't be stunned while attacking. Hyperion has invulnerability while defending.

card.name: Inertia, Edith Freiberg
card.text: Reservist Discard a card -> The controller of target character moves it to a different position. Use only once per turn.

card.name: Lady Lark, Linda Lewis
card.text: Reservist Whenever Lady Lark becomes stunned, you lose endurance equal to the number of cards in your hand.

card.name: Lamprey, Donald McQuiggan
card.text: If Lamprey would cause breakthrough while attacking a character, instead, put a +1/+1 counter on Lamprey.

card.name: Moonglow, Melissa Hanover
card.text: Reservist Moonglow gains the affiliations of each character you control. Activate, discard a card -> You may search your deck for a Team-Up card, reveal it, and put it into your hand.

card.name: Nighthawk, Kyle Richmond
card.text: Reservist Leader: Characters adjacent to Nighthawk can attack hidden characters. Equipped characters adjacent to Nighthawk get +1/+1.

card.name: Power Princess, The Last Utopian
card.text: Leader: Whenever a character adjacent to Power Princess causes breakthrough, each player loses 2 endurance for each card in his hand.

card.name: Power Princess, Zarda
card.text: If Power Princess would cause breakthrough while attacking a character, instead, a character of your choice gets +3/+3 this turn.

card.name: Quagmire, Jerome Meyers
card.text: Discard Quagmire -> Target attacker or defender gets -2 DEF while exhausted this attack.

card.name: Redstone, Michael Redstone
card.text: Reservist (You may recruit this card from your resource row. If you do, you may put a card from your hand face down into your resource row.) If Redstone would cause breakthrough while attacking a character, instead, that character's controller loses 6 endurance.

card.name: Shape, Malleable Mutant
card.text: Shape gets -1 ATK for each card in your hand. Shape gets +1 DEF for each resource you control.

card.name: Skymax, Skrullian Skymaster
card.text: At the start of your recruit step, if Skymax is in your KO'd pile, you may return him to your hand. If you do, discard a card. Skymax can't be stunned while he is attacking and you have no cards in hand.

card.name: Thermite, Sam Yurimoto
card.text: Reservist (You may recruit this card from your resource row. If you do, you may put a card from your hand face down into your resource row.) If Thermite would cause breakthrough, instead, each player discards a card.

card.name: Tom Thumb, Thomas Thompson
card.text: Concealed - Optional Equipped characters you control get +1/+1 while Tom Thumb is visible. Discard an equipment card -> Power-up target attacker or defender you control. Use only if Tom Thumb is hidden.

card.name: Whizzer, Stanley Stewart
card.text: Pay 2 endurance -> Ready Whizzer. Use only once per turn and only if you have no cards in hand.

card.name: AIDA
card.text: Play only during your recruit step. Squadron Supreme characters you control can't be the target of effects your opponents control this turn. Ongoing: At the start of the recovery phase, if you have no cards in hand, turn AIDA face down.

card.name: Airskimmer
card.text: Squadron Supreme characters you control get +1/+1 and have flight. Discard Airskimmer -> Target Squadron Supreme character you control gets +2 ATK while attacking this turn and has flight this turn.

card.name: Answer the Call
card.text: If you have no cards in hand, search your deck for a Squadron Supreme character card, reveal it, and put it into your hand.

card.name: Behavior Modification Device, Team-Up
card.text: Choose two different affiliations among characters you control. Ongoing: Characters you control with either of those affiliations have both of them. Discard a Squadron Supreme character card -> Draw a card, then discard a card. Use only once per turn.

card.name: Eldritch Power
card.text: Target Squadron Supreme character you control gets +3 ATK this turn. Whenever that character causes breakthrough to a player this turn, that player gains 3 endurance.

card.name: Hibernaculum
card.text: To play, discard a Squadron Supreme character card. Put the top three cards of your deck into your KO'd pile. You may return a character card from your KO'd pile to your hand.

card.name: Other-Earth
card.text: Play only if you control a Squadron Supreme character. If you have played no other plot twists this turn, characters your opponents control get -2 DEF while defending this turn, and lose and can't have reinforcement this turn. You can't play plot twists this turn.

card.name: Panacea Potion
card.text: If you have no cards in hand, recover target stunned Squadron Supreme character you control and put a +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Peace in Our Time
card.text: Play only during the build phase and only if you control a Squadron Supreme character. Ongoing: At the start of the recovery phase, each player who controls one or more characters that caused breakthrough this turn discards a card.

card.name: Project Utopia
card.text: Choose a Squadron Supreme character you control. Ongoing: Whenever the chosen character stuns a defender, that defender's controller loses 4 endurance. Whenever the chosen character causes breakthrough, KO it.

card.name: Rocket Central
card.text: Squadron Supreme characters you control get +2 ATK while you have no cards in hand.

card.name: Squadron City
card.text: Activate -> Target Squadron Supreme character you control gets +3 ATK while attacking this turn. Whenever that character causes breakthrough this turn, it can't ready this turn.

card.name: Supply Line
card.text: Play only if you control a Squadron Supreme character. Target attacker or defender you control gets +3 DEF this attack if you have no cards in hand.

card.name: Utopia Isle
card.text: To flip, exhaust two Squadron Supreme characters you control. Whenever an attacker causes breakthrough while attacking a character, that attacker's controller loses 3 endurance.

card.name: Beetle - Mach 1, Reluctant Hero

card.name: Beetle - Mach 3, Repentant Villain
card.text: Characters in combat with Beetle have invulnerability.

card.name: Beetle - Mach 4, New Team Leader
card.text: Leader: Characters adjacent to Beetle with cost 4 or less get +3/+3.

card.name: Blizzard, Donny Gill
card.text: Activate -> Exhaust target character. That character's controller moves it to a different position. Use only during your attack step.

card.name: Charcoal, Charles Burlingame
card.text: Charcoal gets +5 ATK while ready.

card.name: Dallas Riordan, Mayoral Aide
card.text: Concealed - Optional (You may have this character come into play in the hidden area.) Activate -> If you control four or more resources and Dallas Riordan is visible, draw a card. Otherwise, look at the top card of your deck, and you may put it on the bottom of your deck.

card.name: Dallas Riordan - Vantage, Ionic Inheritor

card.text: Reservist (You may recruit this card from your resource row. If you do, you may put a card from your hand face down into your resource row.) When Genis-Vell enters play, each opponent may search his deck for a card and put it into his hand.

card.text: Reservist (You may recruit this card from your resource row. If you do, you may put a card from your hand face down into your resource row.) Leader: Characters adjacent to Hawkeye can't be stunned while attacking a character with a greater cost.

At the start of your recruit step, if Project Liberator is in your KO'd pile, you may discard a Thunderbolts character card. If you do, you may return Project Liberator to your hand.

card.name: Tiger Shark, Todd Arliss
card.text: Reservist (You may recruit this card from your resource row. If you do, you may put a card from your hand face down into your resource row.) Pay 1 resource point -> Tiger Shark gets +2/+2 this turn. Use only once per turn.

card.text: Pay X resource points -> Exhaust target character if its cost is less than X.

card.text: You may KO a Masters of Evil character you control. If you do, reveal the top X cards of your deck, where X is the cost of the character you KO'd. Put one of the revealed cards into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.

card.text: Play only during the build phase. Put target Masters of Evil character card with cost 2 or less from your KO'd pile into your front row if you don't control a character with the same name as that card. KO that character at the start of the recovery phase this turn.

card.name: The Wrecking Crew
card.text: Target Masters of Evil attacker you control gets +2 ATK this attack. Non-Army characters you control that share a cost or version with that attacker and that are adjacent to it get +2 ATK while attacking this turn.

card.name: Under Siege
card.text: Play only during your attack step. To play, exhaust a Masters of Evil character you control. Exchange the positions of target face-down resource you control and target resource an opponent controls.

card.name: Unfair Advantage
card.text: Play only during your recruit step and only if you control a Masters of Evil character. If you have played no other plot twists this turn, gain 1 resource point. Spend this resource point only to pay the cost of a payment power. You can't play plot twists this turn. If Unfair Advantage is in your resource row, turn it face down.

card.name: Amenhotep, Dark Pharaoh
card.text: Reservist Whenever Amenhotep becomes stunned, if he is visible, you may recover him. If you do, move him to your hidden area, and he can't move to a visible area this turn.

card.name: Baltag, Hand of the Conqueror
card.text: Whenever Baltag reinforces a character named Kang, that character has invulnerability while reinforced this attack. A character named Kang protected by Baltag has invulnerability.

card.name: Growing Man, Kinetic Stimuloid
card.text: Exhaust a character you control named Kang -> Put a +1/+1 counter on Growing Man.

card.name: Kang, Non-Unique * Earth Mesozoic-24

card.name: Kang, Non-Unique * Immortus
card.text: Remove Kang and two other cards in your hand from the game -> Negate target effect from a non-ongoing plot twist. Use only if you control a character named Kang and only if Kang is in your hand.

card.name: Kang, Non-Unique * Kang Cobra
card.text: Concealed Characters your opponents control can't become powered-up.

card.name: Kang, Non-Unique * Kang Kong

card.name: Kang, Non-Unique * Kang Ransom

card.name: Kang, Non-Unique * Lord Kang
card.text: Leader: Whenever an attacker adjacent to Kang becomes powered-up, that attacker can't be stunned this attack.

card.name: Kang, Non-Unique * Lord of Limbo
card.text: At the start of the combat phase, the controller of target visible character moves it to his hidden area.

card.name: Kang, Non-Unique * Master of Time

card.name: Kang, Non-Unique * Rama Tut

card.name: Kang, Non-Unique * Ultimate Kang

card.name: Kang's Guards, Army
card.text: Activate, KO Kang's Guards -> Target character you control named Kang has invulnerability while defending this turn.

card.name: Macrobots, Army

card.name: Tempus, Menace out of Time

card.name: Game of the Galaxy
card.text: To play, exhaust a character you control named Kang. Each player reveals the top four cards of his deck. The player who revealed more cards that share a name than any other player may put one of those cards into his hand. Each player puts the rest of his revealed cards on the bottom of his deck.

card.name: Kang Kross-roads
card.text: While you control exactly one visible character, it gets +1/+1. Activate -> Move target stunned character you control named Kang to your hidden area.

card.name: Null Time Zone
card.text: Play only during the build phase. Choose a non-ongoing plot twist card name. Your opponents can't play cards with that name this turn. Ongoing: Exhaust a Kang Council character you control -> Replace Null Time Zone.

card.name: Psyche-Globe

card.name: Spheres of Solitude
card.text: Play only if you control a Kang Council character. Choose an affiliated character an opponent controls. Ongoing: The chosen character loses all affiliations during its controller's attack step.

card.name: The Time Keepers
card.text: Target defender you control gets +1 DEF this attack and an additional +1 DEF this attack if it is named Kang.

card.name: Faces of Evil, Team-Up
card.text: Play only if you control a Masters of Evil character and a Thunderbolts character. Ongoing: Characters you control, as well as cards in your deck, hand, and KO'd pile, with either the Masters of Evil or Thunderbolts affiliation have both affiliations. Characters you control with cost 3 or less get +1 ATK while attacking.

card.name: Justice for All, Team-Up
card.text: Play only if you control an Avengers character and a Thunderbolts character. Ongoing: Characters you control, as well as cards in your deck, hand, and KO'd pile, with either the Avengers or Thunderbolts affiliation have both affiliations. Pay 1 endurance -> Move a leader character you control.

card.name: Supreme Sanction, Team-Up
card.text: Play only if you control an Avengers character and a Squadron Supreme character. Ongoing: Characters you control, as well as cards in your deck, hand, and KO'd pile, with either the Avengers or Squadron Supreme affiliation have both affiliations. Revealed character cards in your resource row have reservist.

card.name: A Day Unlike Any Other, Team-Up
card.text: If there are exactly two different affiliations among characters you control, choose those affiliations. Ongoing: Characters you control, as well as cards in your deck, hand, and KO'd pile, with either of those affiliations have both of them. Pay 3 endurance -> Turn A Day Unlike Any Other face down.

card.name: Avengers Disassembled
card.text: Play only during your attack step. Each player who controls five or more non-stunned characters stuns two non-stunned characters he controls.

card.name: Call to Arms
card.text: Target attacker gets +2 ATK this attack. If that attacker has two or more affiliations, it gets an additional +2 ATK this attack.

card.name: Force Field Belt

card.name: Heroes in Reserve

card.name: The Power Cosmic
card.text: KO all resources you control. If you control Dr. Doom, gain the initiative at the start of the next phase.

card.name: Bastion, Leader of Operation: Zero Tolerance
card.text: Discard a Sentinel character card -> Target character gets +1/+1 this turn.

card.name: Boliver Trask, Creator of the Sentinel Program
card.text: When Bolivar Trask enters play, search your deck for an Army Sentinel character card, reveal it, and put it into your hand.

card.name: Master Mold, Sentinel Supreme
card.text: Master Mold can't attack. Army Sentinel characters you control get +2 ATK. Activate -> Put an Army Sentinel character card from your hand into your front or support row. Use only during your recruit step.

card.name: Nimrod, Mutant Hunter
card.text: When Nimrod enters play, if you control another Sentinel character, put a repair counter on Nimrod. If Nimrod would become stunned and has a repair counter, instead, remove a repair counter from Nimrod and exhaust him.

card.name: Senator Kelly, Anti-Mutant Advocate
card.text: Activate -> Target player loses endurance equal to the number of Army Sentinel characters you control.

card.name: Sentinel Mark I, Army
card.text: Activate, stun Sentinel Mark I -> Stun target character with cost 1 or less.

card.name: Sentinel Mark II, Army
card.text: Activate, discard a Sentinel character card -> Negate target activated character effect.

card.name: Sentinel Mark IV, Army
card.text: Sentinel Mark IV gets +1 ATK for each other non-stunned Army Sentinel character you control.

card.name: Wild Sentinel, Army
card.text: When Wild Sentinel enters play, it gets +1 ATK this turn.

card.name: Combat Protocols
card.text: Choose an affiliation. Army Sentinel characters you control get +2 ATK while attacking a character with the chosen affiliation this turn.

card.name: Micro-Sentinels
card.text: Put a micro counter on up to X target characters that have no micro counters, where X equals the number of Sentinel characters you control. Ongoing: At the start of the draw phase, KO each character with micro counters greater than or equal to that character's cost. Then put a micro counter on each character with a micro counter.

card.name: Orbital Sentinel Base
card.text: Activate, KO a ready Army Sentinel character you control -> KO target stunned character.

card.name: Primary Directive
card.text: Draw a card for each Army Sentinel character you control, unless an opponent controls a non-stunned character.

card.name: Prime Sentinels
card.text: Ongoing: Whenever an opponent plays a plot twist from his resource row, that opponent loses 1 endurance for each non-stunned Sentinel character you control.

card.name: Project: Wide Awake
card.text: To play, exhaust a non-Army Sentinel character you control. Ready target Army Sentinel character.

card.name: Reconstruction Program
card.text: Choose one: Return target character card from your KO'd pile to your hand; or return up to three target Army Sentinel character cards from your KO'd pile to your hand.

card.name: Search and Destroy
card.text: To play, stun a ready Army Sentinel character you control. Stun target character with cost 3 or less. That character's controller reveals his hand and discards all character cards that share a name with that character.

card.name: South American Sentinel Base
card.text: Activate -> Return target Army Sentinel character card from your KO'd pile to your hand.

card.name: Underground Sentinel Base
card.text: Activate -> You may reveal a face-down Army character card with the printed Sentinel affiliation from your resource row and move it face up to your front or support row. Use only during your recruit step.

card.name: Annihilus, Destroyer of Life
card.text: At the start of the combat phase, if Negative Zone is not in play, lose 15 endurance. At the start of your attack step, you may stun target front row character.

card.name: Blastaar, King of Baluur
card.text: At the start of the combat phase, if Negative Zone is not in play, discard your hand. At the start of your attack step, you may stun target support row character.

card.name: Negative Zone
card.text: To flip, discard a card. Activate, discard two cards -> KO target stunned character.

card.name: Skrull Soldier, Army
card.text: Activate -> Target attacker gets +1 ATK this attack for each support row character you control named Skrull Soldier.

card.name: Super Skrull, Engineered Super-Soldier
card.text: Whenever Super Skrull attacks, you may discard a card. If you do, Super Skrull gets +3/+3 this attack, ready all front row Army Skrull characters you control, and each opponent loses 3 endurance. Whenever Super Skrull defends, you may discard up to X cards, where X is the number of attackers. For each card you discarded, Super Skrull gets +3/+3 this attack, and each opponent loses 3 endurance. If you discarded, ready all front row Army Skrull characters you control.

card.name: Apocalypse, En Sabah Nur
card.text: At the start of the combat phase, KO up to two target resources.

card.name: Arcade, Master of Murderworld
card.text: Whenever Arcade stuns a character, KO that character. Whenever Arcade becomes stunned, KO him.

card.name: Black Tom, Thomas Cassidy
card.text: At the start of the combat phase, if you recruited no characters this turn, Black Tom gets +4/+4 this turn.

card.name: Dark Phoenix, Cosmic Entity
card.text: At the start of the combat phase, KO all resources.

card.name: Juggernaut, Cain Marko
card.text: A support row character defending against Juggernaut loses and can't have reinforcement. Whenever Juggernaut attacks, he can't ready during the recovery phase this turn.

card.name: Lady Deathstrike, Yuriko Oyama
card.text: Whenever Lady Deathstrike attacks a character with cost 6 or greater, Lady Deathstrike gets +5/+5 this attack. Whenever Lady Deathstrike defends, she gets +5/+5 this attack for each attacker with cost 6 or greater.

card.name: Mojo, Ruler of Mojoworld
card.text: Mojo gets +3 ATK for each other unaffiliated character you control.

card.name: Mr. Sinister, Dr. Nathaniel Essex
card.text: If Mr. Sinister would become stunned, instead, you may pay 10 endurance. If you do, exhaust Mr. Sinister.

card.name: Onslaught, Psionic Spawn of Xavier and Magneto
card.text: At the start of your attack step, choose an affiliation. Stun all characters with the chosen affiliation.

card.name: Puppet Master, Philip Masters
card.text: Activate -> Target player exhausts a ready character he controls.

card.name: Random Punks, Army
card.text: When Random Punks enters play, all players lose 1 endurance.

card.name: Spiral, Ricochet Rita
card.text: Spiral can attack as though she had flight and range. When Spiral enters your KO'd pile from play, you may return another card named Spiral from your KO'd pile to your hand.

card.name: Acrobatic Dodge
card.text: Target defender you control gets -3/+3 this attack.

card.name: Advanced Hardware
card.text: Equipped character gets +3 ATK, has range, and has Activate -> Target player loses 3 endurance.

card.name: Backfire
card.text: Target character gets -1 DEF this turn. KO all equipment equipped to that character.

card.name: Base of Operations
card.text: Activate -> Look at the top card of your deck. You may put it on the bottom of your deck.

card.name: Betrayal
card.text: Target player stuns a non-stunned character he controls if he controls two or more affiliated characters, unless all affiliated characters he controls share at least one affiliation.

card.name: Blind Sided
card.text: Target character loses and can't have reinforcement this turn.

card.name: Borrowed Blade
card.text: Equipped character gets +1/+1.

card.name: Burn Rubber
card.text: Target character you control has reinforcement this turn. You may move that character to your front or support row.

card.name: Charge!
card.text: Play only during your attack step. Move all characters you control to your front row. Characters you control get +1 ATK while attacking this turn.

card.name: Common Enemy
card.text: Play only if you control a Doom character and a Fantastic Four character. Draw a card. Ongoing: Characters you control, as well as cards in your deck, hand, and KO'd pile, with either the Doom or Fantastic Four affiliation have both affiliations.

card.name: Cover Fire
card.text: Target defender gets +2 DEF this attack for each other non-stunned character you control with range.

card.name: Dual Sidearms
card.text: Equipped character gets +2 ATK and has range.

card.name: Entangle
card.text: To play, exhaust a character you control and discard a card. Exhaust target character if its cost is less than the cost of the character you exhausted.

card.name: Fall Back!
card.text: Play only during an opponent's attack step. Move all characters you control to your support row. Characters you control get +1 DEF while defending this turn.

card.name: Finishing Move
card.text: To play, exhaust a character you control. KO target stunned character.

card.name: Flame Trap
card.text: To play, discard two cards. Stun all characters with cost 2 or less.

card.name: Flying Kick
card.text: Target character gets +3 ATK while attacking this turn and has flight this turn.

card.name: Focused Blast
card.text: To play, exhaust a character you control with range. Target player loses endurance equal to that character's cost.

card.name: Foiled
card.text: Play only from your resource row and only during the combat phase. If Foiled is in your resource row, KO target ongoing plot twist and KO Foiled.

card.name: Friendly Fire
card.text: Characters that team attacked this turn can't ready during the recovery phase this turn.

card.name: Gamma Bomb
card.text: Play only during the combat phase. KO all characters.

card.name: Greater of Two Evils
card.text: Play only during the recovery phase. Target a player who controls a stunned character. That player KO's a stunned character he controls unless he discards two cards.

card.name: Heroes United
card.text: Play only if you control a Fantastic Four character and an X-Men character. Draw a card. Ongoing: Characters you control, as well as cards in your deck, hand, and KO'd pile, with either the Fantastic Four or X-Men affiliation have both affiliations.

card.name: Ka-Boom!
card.text: Play only from your resource row and only during the combat phase. If Ka-Boom! is in your resource row, KO target location and KO Ka-Boom!.

card.name: Kevlar Body Armor
card.text: Equipped character gets +1 DEF. If equipped character would become stunned, instead, you may KO Kevlar Body Armor.

card.name: Last Stand
card.text: Play only if you control three or more stunned characters. Target defender gets +10 DEF this turn.

card.name: Marvel Team-Up
card.text: Choose two different affiliations among characters you control. Ongoing: Characters you control, as well as cards in your deck, hand, and KO'd pile, with either of those affiliations have both of them.

card.name: Medical Attention
card.text: Play only during the recovery phase. To play, exhaust a character you control. Recover target stunned character.

card.name: Mutant Nation
card.text: Play only if you control a Brotherhood character and an X-Men character. Draw a card. Ongoing: Characters you control, as well as cards in your deck, hand, and KO'd pile, with either the Brotherhood or X-Men affiliation have both affiliations.

card.name: Nasty Surprise
card.text: Target defender gets +5 ATK this attack.

card.name: Night Vision
card.text: Ongoing: Each opponent plays with the top card of his deck revealed. You may look at the top card of your deck at any time.

card.name: Not So Fast
card.text: To play, discard a card. Negate target effect from a non-ongoing plot twist with cost 1 or less.

card.name: One-Two Punch
card.text: Target attacker gets +1/+2 this attack.

card.name: Overload
card.text: Stun target character with ATK greater than twice its printed ATK.

card.name: Overpowered
card.text: Each opponent who controls more stunned characters than you puts the top five cards of his deck into his KO'd pile.

card.name: Personal Force Field
card.text: Equipped character gets +3 DEF, has reinforcement, and can't be the target of plot twist effects.

card.name: Political Pressure
card.text: Play only during the draw phase. Each opponent may recruit only one character this turn. Ongoing: At the start of the recovery phase, you may pay 4 endurance. If you do, turn this card face down.

card.name: Press the Attack
card.text: Play only if you control four or more exhausted non-stunned characters. Ready target character.

card.name: Reconnaissance
card.text: Look at each opponent's face-down resources.

card.name: Relocation
card.text: To play, discard a card. Exchange the positions of Relocation and target location an opponent controls.

card.name: Salvage
card.text: Return target equipment or location card from your KO'd pile to your hand. Ongoing: At the start of your resource step, you may pay 4 endurance. If you do, turn Salvage face down.

card.name: Savage Beatdown
card.text: Target attacker gets +5 ATK this attack.

card.name: Surprise Attack
card.text: Target player loses 3 endurance. If that player controls no support row characters, instead, that player loses 5 endurance.

card.name: Swift Escape
card.text: Return target character you control to its owner's hand.

card.name: Team Tactics
card.text: To play, exhaust a character you control. Target attacker gets +X ATK this attack if it shares an affiliation with the character you exhausted, where X is the ATK of the character you exhausted.

card.name: Tech Upgrade
card.text: To play, exhaust a character you control. Search your deck for an equipment card, reveal it, and put it into your hand.

card.name: Unlikely Allies
card.text: Play only if you control a Doom character and an X-Men character. Draw a card. Ongoing: Characters you control, as well as cards in your deck, hand, and KO'd pile, with either the Doom or X-Men affiliation have both affiliations.

card.name: Unstable Molecules
card.text: Equipped character gets +1 DEF. KO Unstable Molecules -> Equipped character gets +3 DEF this turn.

card.name: Black Cat, Felicia Hardy
card.text: Whenever Black Cat attacks, target player puts the top card of his deck into his KO'd pile. If that card has an odd cost, that player discards a card. Whenever Black Cat defends, for each attacker, target player puts the top card of his deck into his KO'd pile. For each of those cards that has an odd cost, that player discards a card.

card.name: Daredevil, The Man Without Fear
card.text: Daredevil can't be stunned while attacking a character with cost 5 or greater.

card.name: Madame Web, Cassandra Webb
card.text: Whenever an activated power of a Spider-Friends character you control is used, gain 2 endurance. Activate -> Look at the top two cards of target player's deck. You may put those cards into that player's KO'd pile or on the top of his deck in any order.

card.name: Prowler, Hobie Brown
card.text: Whenever Prowler causes breakthrough, draw a card, then discard a card.

card.name: Punisher, Vigilante

card.name: Solo, James Bourne

card.text: Whenever Nova attacks, you may discard a Spider-Friends character card. If you do, Nova gets +X ATK this attack, where X is the cost of the card you discarded.

card.name: Daily Bugle
card.text: When you flip Daily Bugle, choose a character name. Whenever a character an opponent controls with the chosen name becomes stunned by one or more Spider-Friends characters you control, you may turn a face-up resource you control face down.

card.text: Whenever a defender you control becomes powered-up, it has reinforcement this attack. Exhaust two Spider-Friends characters you control -> Draw a card.

card.name: Spider Senses
card.text: Target Spider-Friends defender gets +3 DEF this attack.

card.name: Twist of Fate
card.text: To play, discard a Spider-Friends character card. Reveal the top four cards of your deck. Put a revealed character card into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.

card.name: Dr. Octopus, Doc Ock
card.text: Sinister Syndicate defenders you control have reinforcement. Whenever Dr. Octopus stuns a defender, you may stun target support row character.

card.text: Whenever Dr. Octopus attacks, you may exhaust target unprotected character. Activate -> Target Sinister Syndicate defender has reinforcement this attack.

card.text: Activate, discard a Sinister Syndicate character card -> Stun target character with cost 3 or less. Use only during your attack step.

card.name: Green Goblin, Norman Osborn
card.text: Activate, discard a Sinister Syndicate character card -> KO target unprotected support row character. That character's controller loses endurance equal to its cost. Use only during your attack step.

card.name: Kraven the Hunter, Sergei Kravinoff
card.text: At the start of the combat phase, you may choose a character name. If you do, Kraven the Hunter gets +4 ATK while attacking a character with that name this turn.

card.text: Pay 4 endurance -> Lizard gets +2 DEF this attack.

card.text: At the start of your recruit step, KO Rhino unless you pay 4 endurance.

card.name: Venom, Eddie Brock

card.name: Osborn Industries

card.name: Sadistic Choice

card.name: Alley-Oop!

card.text: Target attacker gets +3/+3 while attacking an exhausted defender this attack.

card.name: Jetpack

card.name: No Fear

card.name: Smoke Screen
card.text: KO Smoke Screen -> Target attacker can't be stunned this attack.

card.name: Aunt May, May Parker

card.name: Black Cat, Master Thief
card.text: Evasion Plot twists cost your opponents 2 more to play.

card.name: Cardiac, Elias Wirtham
card.text: Activate -> Stun target character an opponent controls with cost 2 or less. Activate -> Recover target stunned Spider-Friends character you control with cost 2 or less.

card.name: Cloak, Tyrone Johnson
card.text: Loyalty Whenever Cloak stuns an attacker, return that character to its owner's hand. Boost 4: When Cloak enters play, return any number of target characters with cost 4 or less to their owners' hands.

card.name: Dagger, Tandy Bowen
card.text: Activate -> Target player loses 1 endurance for each card in his hand. Use only during your attack step.

card.name: Dusk, Cassie St. Commons
card.text: Evasion Other Spider-Friends characters you control with evasion get +1 DEF. Boost 3: When Dusk enters play, search your deck for a card named Hornet, Prodigy, or Ricochet, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Gain 3 resource points. Spend these points only to recruit a card named Hornet, Prodigy, or Ricochet.

card.name: Ezekiel, Spirit of the Spider

card.name: Firestar, Hot Stuff
card.text: Loyalty Activate -> Stun all characters with cost 2 or less. Use only during your attack step.

card.name: Hornet, Eddie McDonough
card.text: Exhaust a Spider-Friends character you control -> Target player loses 1 endurance.

card.name: Human Torch, Friendly Rival
card.text: Whenever Human Torch attacks, you may pay 3 endurance. If you do, Human Torch gets +X ATK this attack, where X is the number of other non-stunned Spider-Friends characters you control. Whenever Human Torch defends, for each attacker, you may pay 3 endurance. Human Torch gets +X ATK this attack for each 3 endurance you paid, where X is the number of other non-stunned Spider-Friends characters you control.

card.name: Iceman, Cool Customer

card.name: Mary Jane Watson, MJ

card.name: Mattie Franklin - Spider-Woman, Gift of Power
card.text: Whenever Mattie Franklin attacks, reveal any number of face-down resources you control. Mattie Franklin gets +1/+1 this attack for each Spider-Friends character card you revealed. Then replace all Spider-Friends character cards you revealed. Whenever Mattie Franklin defends, reveal any number of face-down resources you control. For each Spider-Friends character card you revealed, Mattie Franklin gets +1/+1 this attack, then replace that revealed card. Repeat this process, from revealing through replacing, until you have done it once for each attacker.

card.name: Prodigy, Richie Gilmore
card.text: Spider-Friends characters you control with cost 3 or less get +3 ATK while defending against a character with greater cost.

card.name: Puma, Thomas Fireheart
card.text: Puma has evasion while attacking. Boost 3: When Puma enters play, he gets +7/+6 this turn.

card.text: Evasion Whenever Will O' The Wisp recovers, put a +1/+1 counter on him.

card.text: To play, exhaust a Spider-Friends character you control. Look at the top four cards of target opponent's deck. Put any number of those cards on the bottom of that player's deck and the rest on the top of that player's deck in any order.

card.text: Whenever you recruit a non-Army Spider-Friends character, you may pay 1 resource point. If you do, draw a card.

card.name: Nice Try!

card.name: Spider-Tracer

card.name: Boomerang, Fred Myers
card.text: Return Boomerang to his owner's hand -> Return target character with cost 2 or less to its owner's hand. Use only if you control another Sinister Syndicate character.

card.name: Scorpion, MacDonald Gargan
