card.name: Cut Off One Head . . .
card.text: To play, KO an Army [Crime Lords Icon] character you control. Return two other target Army character cards each with cost 2 or less from your KO'd pile to play.

card.name: Double Agent!, Team-Up
card.text: Play only if [Crime Lords Icon] and [S.H.I.E.L.D. Icon] are affiliations among characters you control. Gain 4 endurance. Ongoing: Crossover those affiliations.

card.name: Enemies of the State
card.text: Target [Crime Lords Icon] character gets +2 ATK this attack. If that character has at least one other affiliation, it also gets +2 DEF this attack.

card.name: HAIL HYDRA!, Team-Up
card.text: To play, reveal a [Crime Lords Icon] or HYDRA character card from your hand. Ongoing: Characters you control and character cards you own gain the [Crime Lords Icon] affiliation and HYDRA version.

card.name: New King in Town
card.text: Ongoing: Non-Army [Crime Lords Icon] characters you control that share the highest cost among characters you control have reinforcement.

card.name: Ninjas! Ninjas! Ninjas!
card.text: Play only if a [Crime Lords Icon] character attacked a player directly while under your control this turn. KO target stunned character.

card.name: Radically Advanced
card.text: Play only if you control Red Skull. Whenever an opposing character becomes stunned this turn, gain endurance equal to its cost.

card.name: Archangel, Champion
card.text: Discard Archangel -> Target Hulk gets +3 ATK while attacking and has flight this turn. [Activate] -> Return Archangel to his owner's hand. Use only during the combat phase.

card.name: Brood, Brood Creature 2 of 6
card.text: Whenever Brood becomes stunned, you may remove her from the game. If you do, characters you control named Hulk have Whenever Hulk stuns a character, KO that character.

card.name: Caiera, The Oldstrong
card.text: Whenever Caeira becomes stunned, you may remove her from the game. If you do, characters you control named Hulk have Whenever Hulk stuns a character, ready Hulk. This power triggers only once per turn.

card.name: Elloe Kaifi, Slave of the Empire
card.text: Whenever Eloe Kaffi becomes stunned, you may remove her from the game. If you do, characters you control named Hulk get +1/+1.

card.name: Hiroim, The Shamed
card.text: Whenever Hiroim becomes stunned, you may remove him from the game. If you do, characters you control named Hulk have invulnerability.

card.name: Hulk, Exile
card.text: To recruit, discard a card named Hulk.

card.name: Hulk, Green Scar
card.text: Hulk enters play with a gamma counter. Whenever Hulk becomes stunned, if you control no other characters, you may remove a gamma counter. If you do, stun all characters with cost 2 or less.

card.name: Hulk, Gladiator
card.text: Boost - KO a Hulk you control with cost X: When Hulk enters play, stun target character with cost X or less.

card.name: Hulk, The Green King
card.text: Boost - KO a Hulk you control with cost X: Hulk enters play with X +1/+1 counters.

card.name: Hulk, Sakaar'son
card.text: Whenever Hulk becomes stunned during the combat phase, if you control no other characters, you may KO target resource.

card.name: Hulk, Worldbreaker
card.text: Whenever Hulk becomes stunned, if you control no other characters, KO all opposing characters.

card.name: Korg, Kronan Warrior
card.text: Whenever Korg becomes stunned, you may remove him from the game. If you do, characters you control named Hulk have Whenever Hulk becomes stunned, recover him. This power triggers only once per turn.

card.name: Mastermind Excello, Amadeus Cho
card.text: [Activate], Discard a card named Hulk -> Draw two cards. [Activate] -> Return Mastermind Excello to his owner's hand. Use only during the combat phase.

card.name: Miek, The Unhived
card.text: Whenever Miek becomes stunned, you may remove him from the game. If you do, characters you control named Hulk have While Hulk is attacking, defenders lose and can't have reinforcement.

card.name: Rick Jones, Monster's Best Friend
card.text: [Activate] -> Rally for a card with the word Hulk in its name or game text. [Activate] -> Return Rick Jones to his owner's hand. Use only during the combat phase.

card.name: The Great Arena
card.text: [Activate], Exhaust a Hulk you control with cost X -> Exhaust target character with cost X or less. Each player loses X endurance. Use only during the build phase.

card.name: Imperial Dreadnaught
card.text: Terraform [Warbound Icon] characters you control have flight. [Activate], Stun a [Warbound Icon] character you control with cost X -> Gain X endurance.

card.name: Sakaar
card.text: At the start of the recovery phase, you may stun a [Warbound Icon] character you control. If you do, each opponent stuns a non-stunned character he controls with equal or lesser cost.

card.name: Bloodsport
card.text: Play only if you control a defending Hulk. Target opponent chooses a team attacker he controls, removes all other attackers from this attack, and readies those other characters.

card.name: The End of the World
card.text: To play, stun X [Warbound Icon] characters you control. Put X +1/+1 counters on target Hulk.

card.name: Fight or Die!
card.text: Target [Warbound Icon] attacker gets +3 ATK this attack. Boost - Discard a card named Hulk: That attacker gets an additional +3 ATK this attack.

card.name: Hulk Red
card.text: Target [Warbound Icon] defender you control gets +2 DEF this attack, or +4 DEF if you control no other characters.

card.name: Hulk Smash!
card.text: Target attacking Hulk gets +8 ATK this attack.

card.name: Righteous Anger
card.text: Stun target Hulk you control. If you do, recover and ready him. That Hulk can't be the target of effects this turn.

card.name: The Strongest One There Is
card.text: To play, stun a defending Hulk you control with cost X or more. KO target attacker with cost X.

card.name: Warbound to the End
card.text: To play, discard a character card. Search your deck for a card named Hulk. If you control Hulk, you may search for any [Warbound icon] character card instead. Reveal that card and put it into your hand.

card.name: World War Hulk, Team-Up
card.text: Play only if you control Hulk or a [Warbound Icon] character. To play, choose an affiliation other than [Warbound Icon]. Ongoing: Crossover [Warbound Icon] and that affiliation.

card.name: Annihilus, Anti-Matter Master
card.text: When Annihilus enters play, if Negative Zone is not in play, exhaust him. [Activate] -> Stun target hidden character. Use only during your attack step.

card.name: Annihilus, The Living Death that Walks
card.text: At the start of the combat phase, KO up to X target resources, where X is the number of Negative Zone locations in play.

card.name: Blastaar, The Living Bomb Burst
card.text: When Blastaar enters play, if Negative Zone is not in play, exhaust him. [Activate] -> Stun target visible character. Use only during your attack step.

card.name: The Centurians, Army
card.text: At the start of the combat phase, if Negative Zone is not in play, discard a card. The Centurians can't be stunned while attacking.

card.name: Currs, Army
card.text: At the start of the combat phase, if Currs is in your KO'd pile and you control Annihilus, you may discard a card. If you do, put Currs into play.

card.name: Ravenous, Steward of Annihilus
card.text: When Ravenous enters play, you may replace target face-up resource and gain endurance equal to its cost.

card.name: Seekers, Army
card.text: When Seekers enters play, rally for a card with Negative Zone or [Negative Zone icon] in its name, affiliation, or game text.

card.name: Skreet, Chaos Mite
card.text: Whenever Skreet becomes stunned while visible, move her to your hidden area, and target opponent loses 4 endurance.

card.name: Thanos, The Mad Titan
card.text: [Activate] -> Put target character or location card from your KO'd pile face down into your resource row. If you do, KO a resource you control. Use only once per turn.

card.name: Cosmic Control Rod, Unique
card.text: Equip only to Annihilus. Equipped character has invulnerability.

card.name: Negative Zone, Non-Unique * Gateway
card.text: To flip, discard two cards. At the start of the recovery phase, if you control a ready [Negative Zone Icon] character, KO all stunned non-[Negative Zone Icon] characters.

card.name: Negative Zone, Non-Unique * Harvester of Sorrows
card.text: To flip, discard a card. At the start of the recovery phase, gain 1 endurance for each stunned opposing character in play.

card.name: Negative Zone, Non-Unique * Seat of Annihilation
card.text: To flip, discard a card. At the start of the recovery phase, draw a card if an opponent controls more stunned characters than you do.

card.name: Gift for Death
card.text: To play, discard three cards. KO target stunned character. Boost - Exhaust a Thanos you control: Draw three cards.

card.name: Swarm of Annihilus
card.text: Play only if you control Annihilus. Stun target character with cost less than or equal to the number of Negative Zone locations in play.

card.name: Wave of Destruction
card.text: Play only if you control Annihilus. To play, pay X endurance. Replace X target face-up resources.

card.name: Beta Ray Bill, Simon Walters * Omega Flight
card.text: At the start of the combat phase, you may stun target character with cost less than the number of plot twists you played this turn.

card.name: John Walker - U.S. Agent, Omega Flight
card.text: When you play a plot twist from your hand targeting John Walker, you may return it to your hand. This power triggers only once per turn.

card.name: Julia Carpenter - Arachne, Omega Flight
card.text: Whenever you play a plot twist while Julia Carpenter is attacking, you may exhaust target character.

card.name: Sasquatch, Walter Langkowski * Omega Flight
card.text: When you play a plot twist, put a +1/+1 counter on Sasquatch. This power triggers only once per turn.

card.name: Talisman, Elizabeth Twoyoungmen * Omega Flight
card.text: When Talisman enters play, rally for a plot twist card.

card.name: Weapon Omega, Michael Pointer * Omega Flight
card.text: Whenever an opponent plays a plot twist from his hand, remove it from the game. (This doesn't negate it.) You may play cards removed this way.

card.name: Alpha Flight: Reborn
card.text: Play only if you control an [Alpha Flight Icon] character and only from your hand. Return target plot twist or [Alpha Flight Icon] character card from your KO'd pile to your hand. Remove Alpha Flight: Reborn from the game.

card.name: Omega Flight, Team-Up
card.text: To play, choose two different affiliations among characters you control. If you control an [Alpha Flight Icon] character, you may also choose [Alpha Flight Icon]. Ongoing: Crossover those affiliations.

card.name: Black Bolt, Protector of the Space Gem
card.text: Exhaust two different members of the Illuminati you control -> Replace target resource you control and target face-up resource an opponent controls. Use only once per turn. (The members of the Illuminati are Black Bolt, Dr. Strange, Iron Man, Mr. Fantastic, Professor X, and Sub-Mariner.)

card.name: Dr. Strange, Protector of the Soul Gem
card.text: Exhaust two different members of the Illuminati you control -> Negate target payment or plot twist effect. Use only once per turn. (The members of the Illuminati are Black Bolt, Dr. Strange, Iron Man, Mr. Fantastic, Professor X, and Sub-Mariner.)

prop.type: Concealed Character - Infinity Watch, Marvel Knights

card.name: Iron Man, Protector of the Reality Gem
card.text: Exhaust two different members of the Illuminati you control -> Exhaust target character with cost less than the combined cost of the characters you exhausted. Use only once per turn. (The members of the Illuminati are Black Bolt, Dr. Strange, Iron Man, Mr. Fantastic, Professor X, and Sub-Mariner.)

card.name: Mr. Fantastic, Protector of the Power Gem
card.text: Exhaust two different members of the Illuminati you control -> Draw a card. Use only once per turn. (The members of the Illuminati are Black Bolt, Dr. Strange, Iron Man, Mr. Fantastic, Professor X, and Sub-Mariner.)

prop.type: Concealed Character - Infinity Watch, Fantastic Four

card.name: Professor X, Protector of the Mind Gem
card.text: Exhaust two different members of the Illuminati you control -> Target player puts a card from his hand on top of his deck. Use only once per turn and only during the combat phase. (The members of the Illuminati are Black Bolt, Dr. Strange, Iron Man, Mr. Fantastic, Professor X, and Sub-Mariner.)

card.name: Sub-Mariner, Protector of the Time Gem
card.text: Exhaust two different members of the Illuminati you control -> Put a card from your KO'd pile on top of your deck. Use only once per turn. (The members of the Illuminati are Black Bolt, Dr. Strange, Iron Man, Mr. Fantastic, Professor X, and Sub-Mariner.)

card.name: Atlantis
card.text: [Activate], Exhaust a Sub-Mariner you control -> Remove target card in a KO'd pile from the game. You may play that card this turn.

card.name: Undisclosed Location, Non-Unique
card.text: Terraform [Activate] -> Target member of the Illuminati has reinforcement this attack. (The members of the Illuminati are Black Bolt, Dr. Strange, Iron Man, Mr. Fantastic, Professor X, and Sub-Mariner.) At the start of the recovery phase, replace Undisclosed Location.

card.name: The 100 Ideas
card.text: Play only if you control Mr. Fantastic. Look at the bottom four cards of your deck. Put one into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.

card.name: Clandestine Operations
card.text: Play only during the recovery phase. To play, exhaust two different members of the Illuminati you control. (The members of the Illuminati are Black Bolt, Dr. Strange, Iron Man, Mr. Fantastic, Professor X, and Sub-Mariner.) Ongoing: Whenever a character enters play, exhaust it.

card.name: The Elektra Situation
card.text: To play, exhaust two different members of the Illuminati you control. (The members of the Illuminati are Black Bolt, Dr. Strange, Iron Man, Mr. Fantastic, Professor X, and Sub-Mariner.) Choose a name. Ongoing: Opposing characters with that name lose and can't have powers and keywords.

card.name: Essence of Zom
card.text: Play only from your resource row and only if you recruited Dr. Strange this turn. Search your deck for a plot twist card, reveal it, and put it into your hand.

card.name: The Infinity Gauntlet
card.text: Ongoing: Exhaust six different members of the Illuminati you control -> Choose one: KO target character; KO target resource; or target player discards his hand. (The members of the Illuminati are Black Bolt, Dr. Strange, Iron Man, Mr. Fantastic, Professor X, and Sub-Mariner.)

card.name: Realm of the Mind
card.text: Play only during the combat phase. To play, exhaust a Professor X you control. Target player discards a card, and you draw a card.

card.name: Secret Government
card.text: Search your deck for a member of the Illuminati card, reveal it, and put it on top of your deck. Boost - Exhaust a member of the Illuminati you control: Put that card into your hand instead. (The members of the Illuminati are Black Bolt, Dr. Strange, Iron Man, Mr. Fantastic, Professor X, and Sub-Mariner.)

card.name: Silent War
card.text: Play only if you control Black Bolt. KO target location unless an opponent pays 5 endurance. If he does, replace that location instead.

card.name: Loki, Loki Laufeyson
card.text: If a character would attack a character you control, instead, you may have it attack a random character you control.

card.name: Thor, Donald Blake
card.text: Whenever Thor stuns an opposing character, you may discard your hand. If you do, stun each character with cost equal to the cost of a card discarded this way.

card.name: The Reckoning
card.text: To play, exhaust a character you control. Put the top card of your deck into your KO'd pile, and each player loses endurance equal to its cost. If you exhausted a character named Thor this way, ready him.

card.name: Sub-Mariner, The Avenging Son
card.text: Boost - Exhaust X other characters you control: Sub-Mariner enters play with X +1/+1 counters.

card.name: Atlantean Warriors, Army
card.text: You can recruit Atlantean Warriors from your KO'd pile while you control Sub-Mariner. Whenever Atlantean Warriors enters a KO'd pile from play, remove it from the game.

card.name: Magneto, House of M
card.text: When Magneto enters play, KO any number of target equipment with cost 0 equipped to a single character.

card.name: Quicksilver, House of M
card.text: When you recruit Quicksilver, at the start of your next recruit step, you lose the game unless you pay 3 resource points.

card.name: Scarlet Witch, House of M
card.text: When Scarlet Witch enters play, each player replaces all face-up, non-ongoing plot twists he controls.

card.name: Dr. Doom, Future Perfect
card.text: When Dr. Doom enters play, draw a card. When Dr. Doom leaves play outside the recovery phase, turn a plot twist you control face down.

card.name: Torture Chamber
card.text: [Activate], KO a character you control -> Target player loses 2 endurance. At the start of the recovery phase, if you control Dr. Doom, ready Torture Chamber.

card.name: I Am Doom
card.text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target character you control. Boost - KO X characters you control: Also put X +1/+1 counters on a Dr. Doom you control.

card.name: Silver Surfer, The Silver Savage
card.text: A character in front of or behind Silver Surfer has reinforcement. Cosmic: Discard a card -> Move Silver Surfer and he gets +1/+1 this turn.

card.name: Black Bolt, Enemy Within
card.text: Black Bolt gets +1/+1 for each non-[Skrull Icon] affiliation he has.

card.name: James Barnes - Bucky, Kid Commando
card.text: Recruit only if you control Captain America. Whenever a Captain America you control becomes stunned, KO James Barnes.

card.name: Kang, Non-Unique * Time Warrior
card.text: Whenever Kang becomes stunned, remove him from the game. At the start of each of your recruit steps, if you control five or more resources and Kang was removed this way, return him to play with three +1/+1 counters.

card.name: Kang - Iron Lad, Non-Unique * Young Avenger
card.text: Kang can reinforce and team attack as though he had all affiliations. Attackers can't be stunned while Kang is team attacking. At the start of each opponent's attack step, if Kang team attacked this turn, ready him and all characters that team attacked with him this turn.

card.name: Punisher, Captain America
card.text: Reservist [Activate] -> Whenever target character you control becomes stunned while in combat this turn, stun all opposing characters that were in combat with it this turn.

card.name: Aaron Stack, Hater of Fleshy Ones
card.text: Reservist At the start of the combat phase, move all characters adjacent to Aaron Stack so that they're not adjacent to him.

card.name: The Captain, Can't Remember His Real Name
card.text: Reservist At the start of the combat phase, choose a name that The Captain doesn't have. He gains that name, and then say all his names. If you do so correctly, draw a card.

card.name: Elsa Bloodstone, Foulmouthed Bombshell
card.text: Reservist At the start of the combat phase, you may insult target opponent. If you do, he loses 2 endurance. (@#$!)

card.name: Monica Rambeau, I Was an Avenger
card.text: Reservist Monica Rambeau can team attack, reinforce, and be reinforced as though she had the [Avengers Icon] affiliation. (She's not an Avenger.)

card.name: Tabitha Smith, ZOMG!
card.text: Reservist At the start of the combat phase, steal a +1/+1 counter from target character and put it on Tabitha Smith. (She now owns that counter.)

card.name: Ultron, Ultron Prime
card.text: At the start of the combat phase, put a +1/+1 counter on target opposing character. Ultron can't be stunned while in combat with an opposing character with one or more +1/+1 counters.

card.name: Spider-Girl, Daughter of Spider-Man
card.text: Evasion Whenever Spider-Girl becomes stunned, target character loses and can't have flight, powers, and keywords this turn.

card.name: Cammi, Annoying Sidekick
card.text: Characters you control can reinforce and team attack as though they had all affiliations. Whenever you recruit a character, you may move Cammi to your hidden area.

card.name: Drax the Destroyer, Titan Slayer
card.text: Cosmic: Remove an attacker you control from this attack -> If Drax isn't attacking, Drax becomes an attacker. Use only once per turn.

card.name: Phyla-Vell - Quasar, Protector of the Universe
card.text: Characters you control can reinforce and team attack as though they had all affiliations. Cosmic: Whenever Phyla-Vell becomes stunned, recover her.

card.name: Richard Rider - Nova Centurion, Keeper of the Worldmind
card.text: When Richard Rider enters play, remove the top seven cards of your deck from the game. You can play plot twist cards removed this way.

card.name: Ronan the Accuser, Kree Emperor
card.text: Cosmic: Whenever Ronan becomes stunned, you may exhaust target character.

card.name: Star-Lord, Peter Quill
card.text: Cosmic: [Activate], Remove a cosmic counter from Star-Lord -> Stun target character with cost 4 or less if you control no characters with that cost. Use only during the combat phase.

card.name: Super Skrull, Noble Sacrifice
card.text: Cosmic: Invulnerability

card.name: Maverick, Christoph Nord
card.text: Reservist When Maverick enters play, choose a name. [Activate] -> Target character with that name can't attack and its payment powers can't be used this turn. Return Maverick to his owner's hand. Use only during the combat phase.

card.name: Sabretooth, Government Assassin
card.text: Reservist When Sabretooth enters play, choose a name. Whenever Sabretooth stuns a character with that name, you may KO that character. If you do, return Sabretooth to his owner's hand.

card.name: Wolverine, Weapon 10
card.text: Reservist When Wolverine enters play, choose a name. [Activate], Return Wolverine to his owner's hand -> Target character with that name gets -X DEF this turn, where X is its DEF.

card.name: Professor X, Mutant Benefactor
card.text: Free -> Look at the top card of any deck. You may put it on the bottom of that deck. Use only once per turn.

card.name: Abomination, Emil Blonsky
card.text: Whenever one or more opposing characters enter combat with Abomination, remove all counters from them and put a +1/+1 counter on Abomination.

card.name: Adam Warlock, Savior of the Universe
card.text: Whenever another character becomes stunned during the combat phase, put it on top of its owner's deck.

card.name: Aegis, Lady of All Sorrows
card.text: At the start of the combat phase, KO all characters and resources.

card.name: The Beyonder, Inhuman
card.text: Remove The Beyonder and another card in your hand from the game -> Recover target stunned character if there are no other cards named The Beyonder removed from the game. Use only if The Beyonder is in your hand.

card.name: Death, The Second Force of the Universe
card.text: Remove Death and another card in your hand from the game -> KO target stunned character if there are no other cards named Death removed from the game. Use only if Death is in your hand.

card.name: Fin Fang Foom, He Whose Limbs Shatter Mountains
card.text: You may pay 4 resource points rather than pay Fin Fang Foom's recruit cost. When you recruit Fin Fang Foom this way, KO all resources you control and all other characters you control. Then, at the start of the recovery phase this turn, return each character you control to its owner's hand.

card.name: James Barnes - Captain America, Legacy Reborn
card.text: James Barnes enters play with three bullet counters. Remove a bullet counter -> Target character gets -3 DEF this attack. Discard a card named Captain America -> James Barnes gains the name Captain America this turn.

card.name: James Barnes - Winter Soldier, Out in the Cold
card.text: Whenever an opposing character enters play, put a sniper counter on James Barnes. Then, if James Barnes has three or more sniper counters, KO that opposing character and remove all sniper counters.

card.name: Layla Miller, She Knows Stuff
card.text: Remove Layla Miller from the game -> Choose up to two character cards in your KO'd pile. Return each of them to your hand if you control a character with the same name as that card.

card.name: Nick Fury, Off the Grid
card.text: When Nick Fury enters play, look at the top four cards of target player's deck. You may remove one from the game. Put the rest on top of that deck in any order.

card.name: Skaar, Son of Hulk
card.text: Skaar gets +2/+2 while there's a card named Hulk in your KO'd pile.

card.name: Tenebrous, Of the Darkness
card.text: At the start of the combat phase, each player's endurance total becomes 0.

card.name: Quantum Bands, Unique
card.text: Equipped character gets +2/+2, has flight, and gains the affiliations of all other characters in play.

card.name: Alias Investigations
card.text: [Activate] -> Rally for a card type of your choice.

card.name: Asgard
card.text: [Activate] -> Put target character card from your KO'd pile on top of your deck.

card.name: The Raft
card.text: At the start of your recruit step, each player loses 1 endurance for each character he controls.

card.name: Agents of H.A.T.E.
card.text: While attacking a character, each team attacker gets +1 ATK this attack for each other attacker that shares a version with it.

card.name: Annihilating Conquest
card.text: Whenever three or more Army team attackers you control stun a defender this turn, you may ready one of those attackers.

card.name: Carrying the Torch
card.text: To play, choose a character you control with cost 3 or more and remove a character card in your KO'd pile from the game. Ongoing: That character gains the name of the card you removed.

card.name: Casualty of War
card.text: To play, KO a stunned character you control. Gain endurance equal to its cost.

card.name: Code White
card.text: Each player may recover a stunned character he controls. KO all non-leaders recovered this way.

card.name: Collateral Damage
card.text: Target opposing character gets -2 DEF while defending this turn. Boost - Discard two cards: Each other opposing character also gets -2 DEF while defending this turn.

card.name: Death of the Dream
card.text: To play, exhaust a character you control. Replace target face-up resource. Boost - Exhaust an additional character you control: Replace an additional face-up resource.

card.name: Empire's End
card.text: Play only during the build phase. Ongoing: Characters that entered play this turn get -2 ATK.

card.name: Flattened
card.text: To play, discard a card. Target stunned character can't ready this turn.

card.name: Frog of Thunder
card.text: Play only during the build phase. To play, discard a character card. Target an opposing character. Reveal cards from the top of its controller's deck until you reveal a character card with the same cost as that character. If you do, KO that character and put that card into play in the same position. Shuffle all other revealed cards into that deck.

card.name: Grudge Match
card.text: If target attacker has the same cost as a defender, that attacker gets +3/+3 this attack.

card.name: Heroes for Hire, Team-Up
card.text: To play, choose an affiliation among characters you control. Ongoing: Pay 1 endurance -> Choose a character you control. It gains that affiliation this turn.

card.name: House of M
card.text: Characters you control have flight this turn. Opposing characters lose and can't have flight this turn.

card.name: Hunt for Nitro
card.text: To play, exhaust a character you control. The controller of target hidden character moves it to his visible area.

card.name: I Got 'Em All!
card.text: To play, return a ready Marvel character you control with cost X to its owner's hand. Ready target character with cost less than X.

card.name: Invasion Plans
card.text: Play only during your attack step. To play, exhaust a character you control. Draw two cards.

card.name: Lay Down with Dogs
card.text: To play, discard a character card. Choose one: Target character you control has reinforcement this turn; or target character loses and can't have reinforcement this turn.

card.name: Losing the Argument
card.text: Draw two cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your deck.

card.name: Messiah Complex
card.text: Return target character card from your KO'd pile to your hand. Boost - Exhaust two characters you control: Gain endurance equal to the cost of the card you returned.

card.name: My Name Is Peter Parker . . .
card.text: To play, choose a character you control and reveal your hand. Ongoing: At the start of the recovery phase, you may discard a card. If you do, recover the chosen character.

card.name: No Retreat, No Surrender
card.text: Target defender has reinforcement this attack. Boost - Discard three cards: That defender also has invulnerability this attack.

card.name: Now I'm Fighting Dirty
card.text: Target attacker or defender gets +1/+1 this attack. Boost - Discard your hand: That character gets an additional +2/+2 this attack.

card.name: Outmatched
card.text: Play only if you control more stunned characters than an opponent. Target attacker or defender gets +3 ATK this attack.

card.name: Public Outcry
card.text: Target attacker or defender gets -1/-1 this attack.

card.name: Rogue Squadron
card.text: Put up to three target Army character cards from your KO'd pile on top of your deck.

card.name: She-Hulk Smash!
card.text: Target attacker gets +2 ATK this attack for each character in target opponent's front row.

card.name: Sleeper Cells

card.name: Eureka!
card.text: Play only if you recruited Mr. Fantastic this turn. Search your deck for an equipment card, reveal it, and put it into your hand.

card.name: Family of Four
card.text: Target character gets +1/+1 this attack for each Human Torch, Invisible Woman, Mr. Fantastic, and Thing you control.

card.name: Firewall

card.name: Force Field Projection

card.name: Heat Wave

card.name: Invisibility
card.text: Play only if you control Invisible Woman. Move any number of characters you control to your hidden area.

card.name: It's Clobberin' Time!
card.text: Target [Fantastic Four Icon] attacker you control gets +3/+3 this attack.

card.name: Reed and Sue
card.text: Target [Fantastic Four Icon] defender gets +1 DEF or has reinforcement this attack.

card.name: Signal Flare

card.name: Stretch Out

card.name: Torch and Thing
card.text: Target [Fantastic Four Icon] attacker gets +2 ATK or can't be stunned this attack.

card.name: Boris, Personal Servant of Dr. Doom

card.name: Doom-Bot, Army

card.name: Doom-Bot II, Army

card.name: Dr. Doom, Diabolic Genius

card.name: Dr. Doom, Gypsy King
card.text: When Dr. Doom enters play, look at target face-down opposing resource. If it's a non-ongoing plot twist, you may turn it face up.

card.name: Dr. Doom, Fearsome Monarch
card.text: Each opponent can't play plot twists with the same name as a card in his KO'd pile or resource row while you control another non-stunned [Doom Icon] character.

card.name: Dr. Doom, Lord of Latveria
card.text: When Dr. Doom enters play, turn up to X face-up resources face down, where X is the number of [Doom Icon] characters you control. Whenever Dr. Doom attacks, you may return a plot twist card from your KO'd pile to your hand.

card.text: Dragon Man gets +3 ATK while attacking a [Fantastic Four Icon] character.

card.name: Dreadnought Tank, Arsenal of Doom
card.text: At the start of the combat phase, if you control Dr. Doom, return any number of target characters with combined cost 3 or less to their owners' hands.

card.name: Pacifier Robot, Army
card.text: [Activate] -> KO target stunned character. Use only if you control Dr. Doom.

card.name: Puppet Master, Overprotective Father

card.name: Swarm Bots, Army
card.text: KO Swarm Bots -> Put a +1/+1 counter on target Dr. Doom.

card.name: Ultron, Army

card.name: Armor of Doom
